attributes.action: No MP or their family may use private medical insurance
attributes.additional_details: only by the MPs demonstrating that "we are all in this together " can we believe that they will make the necessary required urgent changes
attributes.background: All MP's should experience the same waiting times, cancellation of appointments and the general service the Public experience, this should include their immediate families for as long as they remain an MP

rejection.details: This is an individual decision for MPs and their families, not the responsibility of the UK Government and Parliament as a whole.
